description: This Java source file defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application, providing basic info endpoints to verify the application's operation and retrieve application details.

classes.name: InfoController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing info endpoints for health check and application info.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the root URL '/' and returns a simple verification message.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns information about the application.
